name: Enga Extreme Battle Race
description:
Enga Extreme Battle Race (EBR) as the name suggested, PvPvE extreme time-attack racing with battle. 8 different upgradeable 4x4 allroad vehicles, many maps and different battle modes. You can take a tour on nature or you can push the speed limits of your vehicle on the roads.

Every vehicle has its own unique weapon and species, Easy upgrading system that based on your EBR level.

Drop system, area defence weapons, hidden places and tactical traps on maps.

In game store to Buy/Upgrade vehicle-ammo.

Get ready to EBR

Next Update Notes;

-Training is no longer to be necessary to start the single player maps but it will give coin and ammo as reward at the end of it,
-Easy and Hard mode will add (easy mode will show the location of next checkpoint but rewards will be less on easy mode),

This update will add before the multiplayer pack update.
